StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Unmotivated wage slave
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_pronoun]'s smart and personable, but somehow, things just never came together for [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_pronoun] still hasn't finished [PAWN_possessive] thesis, so [PAWN_possessive] degree is still pending. [PAWN_pronoun]'s worked a variety of jobs, but has never had what could be honestly considered a career. [PAWN_pronoun] wastes most of [PAWN_possessive] time playing VR games in the company of [PAWN_possessive] cats.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Transport captain
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: After spending a few years fighting on the losing side of a rebellion, [PAWN_nameDef] bought [PAWN_objective]self a derelect transport ship and began working for hire. [PAWN_pronoun] was known for taking on any job that would pay, with the job's legality or lack thereof simply modifying the price [PAWN_pronoun] charged.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Transport pilot
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Traveling widely, [PAWN_nameDef]'s skills and reputation as a pilot grew so that [PAWN_pronoun] was actively courted by multiple captains. [PAWN_pronoun] finally settled in as the pilot of a small transport ship.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Companion
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Companion, a licensed high-society courtesan. Companions are part of the social elite, often accompanying the wealthy and powerful. There is considerable ritual and ceremony surrounding their services, which extend beyond sex to nurturing psychological, spiritual, physical, and emotional well being.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Starship engineer
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an engineer on a starship. [PAWN_pronoun] kept things running "smoothly," but also tended to tinker with things on the ship that [PAWN_pronoun] probably should have left alone.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Glitterworld surgeon
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a surgeon on a world mostly free of disease and human suffering. [PAWN_possessive] job mostly involved elaborate and creative cosmetic surgeries. [PAWN_pronoun] has a good understanding of human biology, but never had to remove a cancer or a bullet.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Mercenary
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] respects cash above all else. [PAWN_pronoun] signed on with a mercenary group, where [PAWN_pronoun] developed [PAWN_possessive] weapon and survival skills. [PAWN_nameDef] did dirty work where [PAWN_pronoun] found it, and travelled to many worlds looking for it.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Missionary
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] devoted [PAWN_possessive] life to religious service. [PAWN_pronoun] vowed to renounce violence, and spent [PAWN_possessive] time preaching and serving food in soup kitchens to the homeless.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Special forces
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a skilled soldier. [PAWN_pronoun] was so skilled, in fact, that [PAWN_pronoun] entered the special forces to battle militants and xenohuman raiders. [PAWN_pronoun] never imagined [PAWN_objective]self a lone hero, but [PAWN_pronoun] played [PAWN_possessive] part in the group well.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Super soldier
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the product of a super-soldier program run by a now-deposed government. Knowing that [PAWN_pronoun] would be "decommissioned" with extreme prejudice if discovered by those now in power, [PAWN_pronoun] went on the run, hiding [PAWN_possessive] identity.
